pkgmetadata.longdescription: # metaknowledge`metaknowledge` is a Python3 package that simplifies bibliometric research using data from various sources. It reads a directory of plain text files containing meta-data on publications and citations, and writes to a variety of data structures that are suitable for quantitative, network, and text analyses. It handles large datasets (e.g. several million records) efficiently. You can find the [documentation](https://metaknowledge.readthedocs.io/).## InstallingTo install run `python3 setup.py install`
